Package tw.jruletest.files

Class FileFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • tw.jruletest.files.FileFinder
  • public class FileFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class providing methods capable of collecting Java files as well as finding files from a specific directory and getting the class name from a provided file.

      • collectFiles

        public static void collectFiles​(java.lang.String topLevelFilename)
        Collects all Java files from within the root folder specified by the provided file name
        Parameters:
        topLevelFilename - the name of the folder from which to start the depth first search for Java files

        Collects all Java files from within the root folder specified by the provided file object

      • getClassName

        public static java.lang.String getClassName​(java.io.File file)
        Gets the name of the class declared within the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - a File object representing the file that defined the class
        Returns:
        the full name of the class

      • getClassName

        public static java.lang.String getClassName​(java.lang.String filename)
        Gets the name of the class identified by the specified file name using the top 'java' directory as the default root folder. The file name is used to generate the file name, not the contents of the file.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file that defined the class
        Returns:
        the full name of the class

      • getClassName

        public static java.lang.String getClassName​(java.lang.String filename,
                                            java.lang.String root)
        Gets the name of the class identified by the specified file name using a specific folder as the root directory. The file name is used to generate the file name, not the contents of the file.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file that defined the class
        root - the name of the folder(s) that will act as the root folder
        Returns:
        the full name of the class
